text: Eghtɨ suren gumazim uan tisan mɨn otoghɨva, egh deragham. Egh ingangarir gumazim uan ekiamɨn mɨn otoghɨva, a uaghan deragham. Me ziar kam Belsebul a isa dɨpenimɨn ghuavim gatɨ, ezɨ e kamaghɨn fo, me uaghan bar ziar kuraba da isɨva an adarazi darɨgham.”(10:25) Ziam Belselbul, a Satanɨn ziar mam. Matyu 12:22-28ɨn gan.
